comment:
* This class implements a general iterator for
 * those LocationSteps with only one step, and perhaps a predicate, 
 * that only go forward (i.e. it can not be used with ancestors, 
 * preceding, etc.)
 * @see org.apache.xpath.axes#ChildTestIterator
 * @xsl.usage advanced

variables.name: m_axis
variables.comment: The traversal axis from where the nodes will be filtered.

methods.name: public void setRoot(int context, Object environment)
methods.comment:
* Initialize the context values for this expression
   * after it is cloned.
   *
   * @param context The XPath runtime context for this
   * transformation.

methods.name: protected int getNextNode()
methods.comment: * Get the next node via getFirstAttribute && getNextAttribute.

methods.name: public int getAxis()
methods.comment:
* Returns the axis being iterated, if it is known.
   * 
   * @return Axis.CHILD, etc., or -1 if the axis is not known or is of multiple 
   * types.

methodNames: public void setRoot(int context, Object environment)
